name: Project.html
body:
<html>

<head>
    <title>Processing Template</title>
    <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/p5.js/0.4.13/p5.js"></script>
    <script>
        var dogX;//
        var block1;
        var block2;
        var block3;
        var block4;
        var block5;
        function setup() {
            createCanvas(600, 800);
            block1 = new Block();
            block2 = new Block();
            block3 = new Block();
            block4 = new Block();
            block5 = new Block();
        }

        function draw() {
            background(0, 0, 102);
            fill(153, 255, 255);
            stroke(153, 255, 255);
            rect(100, 0, 400, 800);
            stroke(0, 102, 102);
            strokeWeight(15);
            rect(100, -10, 400, 900);
            moveDog();
            fill(255, 0, 0);
            stroke(255, 0, 0);
            block1.move();
            block1.display();
            block1.checkCollide();
            block2.move();
            block2.display();
            block2.checkCollide();
            block3.move();
            block3.display();
            block3.checkCollide();
            block4.move();
            block4.display();
            block4.checkCollide();
            block5.move();
            block5.display();
            block5.checkCollide();
            


        }

        function moveDog() {
            dogX = mouseX - 20;
            stroke(random(255), random(255), random(255));
            strokeWeight(1)
            fill(255, 255, 204);
            ellipse(dogX, 740, 40, 70);
            fill(255, 255, 204);
            ellipse(dogX, 700, 40, 40);
            fill(255, 255, 204);
            ellipse(dogX, 790, 10, 40);
            ellipse(dogX - 20, 700, 10, 20);
            ellipse(dogX + 20, 700, 10, 20);

        }

        function Block() {
            this.x = random(width);
            this.y = random(height);
            this.speed = random(0, 20);

            this.move = function() {
                if (this.y < height) {
                    this.y += this.speed;
                }
                if (this.y > height) {
                    this.y = 0;
                }

            }
            this.display = function() {
                rect(this.x, this.y, 75, 50);
            }
            this.checkCollide = function() {
                if (this.y > 600 && this.x + 75 > dogX - 20 && this.x < dogX + 20) {
                    text("GAME OVER!", width / 2.25, height / 2);
                    noLoop();
                }
            }


        }
        /**/
    </script>
</head>

<body>

</body>

</html>
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
